0.0.3.en: removed change log from readme, provided sharper images.

0.0.6.en: Fixed battery polling, Added battery alarm trigger

0.0.7.en: Fixed battery levels so they match the Soma App.

1.0.0.en: Fixed battery % and alarm, Added window covering state for Open / Close / Stop controls.

1.0.1.en: Simplified interface to follow Athom guidelines, e.g. removed Open / Close / Stop controls.

1.1.1.en: Support for Soma Connect V2.2.0 Tilt changes. Added settings for device type (shades / tilt) and direction reversal

1.1.3.en: Rewrite of Polling system. Battery state only refreshes once per hour to reduce load

1.1.4.en: Fixed a bug in the logging that allowed a lot of memory to be used.

1.1.5.en: Trim spaces from IP address input.

1.2.2.en: Converted to SDK 3. Fix issue with pairing. Add timeout to http requests

2.0.0.en: The Connect bridge is now detected using mDNS so no longer need to set the IP address. Support for multiple Connect bridges.

2.0.1.en: Updated images for current Athom store requirements

2.0.3.en: Added app settings to allow a bridge to be defined by IP address, Added a repair option to the device.

2.0.4.en: Fix issues introduce in 2.0.3. Added USB Bridge option to allow for changed API message format

2.0.5.en: Update command to get data USB API

2.0.6.en: Update set positioncommand for USB API. Use new battery percentage if it's available

2.0.7.en: Send direction and night mode to USB API
